Screen.question: Push the arduino firmly into the breadboard, it might click into place. Does it work now?

ReplaceLCD.question: Contact CrunchLabs for a replacement screen

LCDAnotherArduino.question: Try uploading Label Maker code to a different Arduino from ide.crunchlabs.com, and use this arduino. Does it work now?

ReplacementArduino.question: Contact CrunchLabs for a replacement Arduino

BackwardsFix.question: Take the 4 signal wires for the backwards motor, and flip them around in the breadboard

MotorAnotherArduino.question: Try uploading Label Maker code to a different Arduino from ide.crunchlabs.com, and use this arduino. Does it work now?

SwapMotorsCheck.question: If a motor isn't working, swap which motor is plugged into which driver, you will need to unscrew a driver from the wall to reach. Does the broken axis swap to being the other motor?

ReplacementDriver.question: Contact CrunchLabs for a replacement driver

ReplacementMotor.question: Contact CrunchLabs for a replacement Stepper Motor

Servo.question: Is the servo moving or making sound?

ReplacementServo.question: Contact CrunchLabs for a replacement servo

Joystick.question: Push the arduino firmly into the breadboard, it might click into place. Does it work now?

ReplacementJoystick.question: Contact CrunchLabs for a replacement joystick

Power.question: Push the arduino firmly into the breadboard, it might click into place. Did it turn on?

CheckBackwardsWires.question: Make sure you don't have red and black wires backwards. Does it turn on now?

TryAnotherBattery.question: Try a charged battery from another Hack Pack. Does it turn on now?

ReplacementBattery.question: Charge your battery, if it still doesn't work contact CrunchLabs for a replacement battery
